articles.description: The infamous house where Depp and Heard’s two Yorkshire terriers, Pistol and Boo, were held hostage after they were illegally smuggled into the country is now making news for other reasons.

articles.title: Zendaya and Tom Holland CUDDLE UP in Boston - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Zendaya and Tom Holland were snapped in Boston on Sunday, cuddling up while they strolled through town together.

articles.description: Oscar-winner Dustin Lance Black defends "Under the Banner of Heaven" against criticism from church-owned Deseret News at premiere event in Salt Lake City.

articles.title: Camila Cabello in bra and undies as she signs with Victoria's Secret - Daily Mail
articles.description: Camila Cabello has gone out of her way this year to send out body positive notes on Instagram. And now the singer has brought her message to Victoria's Secret as she has signed with the brand.
